question:
The federal government knows that a certain level of financial stability can be attained by lowering interest rates, yet if it overuses this power, it risks losing its most reliable means of ________ a crisis.
Two Answers
A. interring
B. exacerbating
C. annihilating
D. palliating
E. compounding
F. assuaging
